halla is an adjective meaning "tall" in: File:Halla.pngHalla is also the name in Quenya of a letter that was originally used to represent "breath" H.  It might be placed before a consonant to indicated that it was unvoiced and breathed
Note: such as expressing voiceless l or r.  Over time though the letter Harma
The names of the letters: when used at the beginning of a word
Footnote 1: came to represent "breath" h (and is then called Aha).
